entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Ulukhaktok
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 30. Wind chill near minus 39. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: A few clouds. High minus 26.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind becoming east 20 km/h late in the morning. High minus 26. Wind chill near minus 42. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Temperature rising to minus 20 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind east 30 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 20 by morning. Wind chill minus 39 in the evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 01 January 2023
